${ModID}:SummonVegetables.NAME: Summon Vegetables
${ModID}:SummonVegetables.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Skill played this turn.

${ModID}:SummonTrees.NAME: Summon Trees
${ModID}:SummonTrees.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Take !M! less damage from Attacks this turn.
${ModID}:SummonTrees.FLAVOR: There's a lot of weapons that are awkward to swing when you're surrounded by obstacles.  Like trees.

${ModID}:SummonElephant.NAME: Summon Elephant
${ModID}:SummonElephant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Take !M! damage.
${ModID}:SummonElephant.FLAVOR: This is my favorite card.  I hope you like it.

${ModID}:RainbowLouse.NAME: Rainbow Louse
${ModID}:RainbowLouse.FLAVOR: The result of an unwise magic experiment.

${ModID}:Control.NAME: Control
${ModID}:Control.FLAVOR: It isn't just about what you can summon, but how effectively you can direct them.

${ModID}:DemonicRitual.NAME: Demonic Ritual
${ModID}:DemonicRitual.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain Strength equal to its total cost.
${ModID}:DemonicRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain Strength equal to its total cost + !M!.
${ModID}:DemonicRitual.FLAVOR: This is a good idea and can not in anyway backfire.

${ModID}:SummonPandas.NAME: Summon Pandas
${ModID}:SummonPandas.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel a !M! damage ${ModID}:Panda.
